sentence.text: However, no study has investigated the relationship between androgen catabolic process in living brains and personality negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II including aggression.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Before performing PET scans, subjects answered the Buss-Perry Aggression Questionnaire and Temperament and Character Inventory to measure their aggression and personality negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, respectively.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Females showed associations between androgen catabolic process levels in subcortical regions, such as the amygdala and supraoptic nucleus of the hypothalamus, and personality negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II such as aggression, novelty seeking, and self-transcendence.
